question: Which of the following butterflies mentioned in the reading was the focus of a study in England?
Which of the following butterflies is known for being attracted to alcohol?
According to the reading, butterflies who fly longer distances in search of food plants are known as _____, and they may actually increase in numbers as a result of climate change.
According to the reading, the Quino Checkerspot butterfly has had a difficult time migrating (遷徙) around which American city?
Moths and butterflies are considered to be poikilothermic. This means they are _____.
According to the reading, the period of time after the Industrial Revolution (工業革命) through the present is known as the _____.
Which of the following butterflies is NOT found in Taiwan?
Which of the following is the sientific name for moths and butterflies?
According to the reading, climate change is causing some butterflies to become _____.
Why are butterflies considered an indicator species?
answer: Because they have been studied in more detail than other insects, and they are quite sensitive to their surroundings.
